title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user); runs in Docker.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, fuzzy model search and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant à la GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + FAISS.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Lightweight framework to run ReAct and Plan-and-Execute agents backed by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator, OllamaChatGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package: JS SDK for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package: Python client for Ollama model management and inference.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; tokio-based with serde types and streaming support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ and Unity; NuGet package available.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines and generate release notes.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to your server using Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private or threaded LLM conversations.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP library wrapping Ollama REST API with GenServer and LiveView examples.
